p: Aerial parts of the three Plectranthus species were collected from Al-Baha region, Saudi Arabia in December 2016 and authenticated at the Pharmacognosy Department, College of Pharmacy, King Saud University (KSU). Voucher samples (KSU 16263, 15,779 and 15,732) were deposited for the three species P. cylindraceus Hocst. ex Benth. , P. asirensis JRI Wood and P. barbatus Andrews respectively at the Pharmacognosy Department, College of Pharmacy, KSU.
